title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

items.title: Deutsche Bank accelerates Cloud journeys with Google Cloud Consulting

ai.summary: Based on the available description… Google Cloud Consulting designed novel learning experiences that helped thousands of Deutsche Bank engineers become fluent in cloud engineering. They used Generative AI to create personalized, interactive training that combines on‑demand convenience with the effectiveness of instructor‑led sessions, and the Consulting Learning Services team provided the creative innovation and technical expertise to build the Deutsche Bank Cloud Engineering Program and accelerate the bank's cloud journey.
bullets: Novel learning experiences trained thousands of engineers in cloud engineering.
Generative AI was used to create personalized, interactive training.
Training combined on‑demand learning with instructor‑led effectiveness.
Google Cloud Consulting Learning Services provided creative and technical support.
The program aimed to massively accelerate Deutsche Bank's cloud journey.
takeaways: Upskilling engineering teams at scale is essential for accelerating cloud adoption.
Generative AI can personalize and scale training, reducing reliance on traditional classroom models.
A blended approach (on‑demand + instructor‑led) can improve training effectiveness for technical staff.
Partnering with experienced cloud consulting teams can speed program design and implementation.

items.title: Year-end toolkit: Strengthening audit committee collaboration

ai.summary: Based on the available description… This episode of PwC’s year-end toolkit focuses on strengthening collaboration between finance teams and the audit committee, streamlining year-end accounting and reporting, and addressing emerging topics like AI, enterprise risk management, transformation initiatives, and cyber risk. The program is organized into segments covering communication strategies, key year-end issues, AI oversight, ERM enhancement, cyber risk in the age of AI, and proxy disclosures.
bullets: Best practices for management/audit committee communication and collaboration to support an expanding oversight agenda.
Key year-end accounting and reporting issues finance teams should be prepared to address.
Oversight of AI: discussing risks, opportunities, and necessary controls.
Enhancing enterprise risk oversight and navigating the evolving cyber risk landscape amid AI developments.
Considerations for elevating proxy disclosures related to governance and year‑end reporting.
takeaways: Prioritize clear, concise reporting to the audit committee on AI initiatives and controls so governance can assess risk and oversight needs.
Embed AI and cyber considerations into enterprise risk management and year‑end reporting to align with audit committee expectations.
Prepare focused materials on transformation initiatives and other key year‑end issues to help the audit committee manage a packed agenda.
Review and update proxy disclosures to reflect governance, risk oversight, and material developments related to AI and cyber.

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

ai.summary: Based on the available description, the video highlights route planning made easy as Jo discovers the power of Copilot Groups. It presents Microsoft Copilot (with hashtags #copilot #microsoftcopilot #ai) demonstrating Copilot Groups for planning workflows.
bullets: Focus: route planning made easy.
Features: Copilot Groups as the central capability.
Narrative: Jo discovers how Copilot Groups work.
Framing: promoted by Microsoft Copilot channel.
Includes hashtags: #copilot #microsoftcopilot #ai
takeaways: Consider whether AI-enabled route planning (Copilot Groups) is relevant to your field operations and maintenance workflows.
Assess potential use cases where group-based planning could intersect with site access, crew coordination, or logistics.
If relevant, plan a small pilot to evaluate fit, integration needs, and operational impact before wider adoption.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description, AI in audit is presented as a current, practical element of KPMG Poland’s audit work, helping with repetitive tasks, large-data analysis and decision-making. Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska outline specific tools (AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI, KPMG Clara and Clara for Clients), the move from sampling to full-population analysis, changes to the auditor role, and implementation challenges including data security and regulation.
bullets: AI Transaction Scoring Tool enables analysis of full populations rather than sampling.
Clara AI offers conversational assistants and specialized agents to support auditors.
AI aids documentation and analysis of disclosures, improving efficiency.
KPMG Clara platform provides real-time audit management; Clara for Clients modernizes client communication.
Key topics include auditor upskilling, adoption challenges, data security and regulatory considerations.
takeaways: Adopt tools that enable full-population data analysis to improve audit coverage and accuracy.
Use real-time audit platforms and client-facing AI to increase transparency and streamline communication.
Prioritize secure data handling and regulatory compliance when deploying AI in audit workflows.
Invest in auditor upskilling and hiring for AI-related competencies to realize AI benefits.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Arknights: Endfield has launched and officially features NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The launch trailer was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode, with links to the game and NVIDIA coverage provided.
bullets: Arknights: Endfield is a 3D real-time strategy RPG taking place on Talos-II.
The game launch highlights NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation.
Trailer footage captured on GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra, DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
Description includes official game site and multiple social channel links.
Video published by NVIDIA GeForce with related hashtags (#ArknightsEndfield, #RTXOn, #DLSS4).
takeaways: DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is being adopted in a commercial game release—consider compatibility when evaluating graphics hardware purchases.
Trailer capture on an RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings indicates use cases that leverage high-end GPUs for real-time 3D rendering workloads.
Ensure driver and software stack support for DLSS 4/Multi Frame Generation if provisioning systems for modern gaming or real-time rendering pipelines.
